channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The AI Slur ‘Clanker’ Has Become a Cover for Racist TikTok Skits
item.description: The online trend takes a comedic approach to spreading anti-AI messaging, but some creators are using racist references to make their point.

item.title: Battlefield alum DevAlly raises €2M to help companies with Europe’s feisty new accessibility law
item.description: Regulatory tailwinds and growing awareness around accessibility helped DevAlly secure €2 million in pre-seed funding.

item.title: 100 Best Prime Day Deals Under $100 (2025): Chargers, Earbuds, and More
item.description: We've scoured Amazon for the best deals under a Benjamin, from Roku to Instant Pot.

item.title: We Found 265 of the Best Prime Day Deals Still on for 2025: Up To 55% Off
item.description: Time is running out—don’t miss Amazon's fall 2025 Prime Day sale deals on WIRED-tested favorites like Kindles, laptops, Apple Watches, robot vacs, and...

item.title: OpenAI’s affordable ChatGPT Go plan expands to 16 new countries in Asia
item.description: OpenAI is expanding its $5 per month ChatGPT Go plan to 16 more countries.

item.title: Novoloop’s upcycled plastic takes a step closer to production
item.description: Novoloop has signed a deal with a contract manufacturer to produce its Lifecycled TPU material.

item.title: 6 Best Smart Locks (2025) for Front Doors, Slider Doors, and Even Garages
item.description: Upgrade your locks with fingerprint-scanning or a keypad, whether it’s at the front door or a sliding glass entryway.

item.title: Even after Stargate, Oracle, Nvidia, and AMD, OpenAI has more big deals coming soon, Sam Altman says
item.description: By some estimates, OpenAI has this year inked $1 trillion worth of infrastructure deals. Altman says to expect even more.

item.title: Ferrari Reveals Its Electric Powerhouse, and What Could Finally Be Real EV Sound
item.description: More than 1,000 hp, 192 mph, and regen braking with more than half the force of an emergency stop aren't enough for the Italian carmaker—it might just...

item.title: Here’s what it’s really like to appear on billionaire VC Tim Draper’s ‘Meet the Drapers’ pitch show
item.description: The show is one of many on Draper's newly launched television channel, DraperTV, which offers programming around business and entrepreneurship, availa...
